results.name: Furries & Scalies & Scarecrows OH MY!: Complete Edition
Return to Glitchland - TheZZAZZGlitch's April Fools Event 2022

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX Vega 56 or better
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2080 / AMD RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
